informationNeed.text: prefix text: <http://jena.apache.org/text#> prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> Select ?document ?sc1 ?sc2 ?sc3 ?sc4 ?sc5 ?sc6 ?score where { ?document dc:language 'spa' . ?document dc:type ?t . FILTER(?t = 'TAZ-TFG' || ?t = 'TAZ-TFM') . ?document dc:date ?y . FILTER(?y >= '2003') . ?document dc:title ?title . ?document dc:description ?desc . ?document dc:subject ?subj . optional { filter (contains (ucase(?title), 'ANIMACION')) bind (1 as ?sc1) } . optional { filter (contains (ucase(?desc), 'ANIMACION')) bind (0.5 as ?sc2) } . optional { filter (contains (ucase(?subj), 'ANIMACION')) bind (0.75 as ?sc3) } . optional { filter (contains (ucase(?title), 'VISION') && contains (ucase(?title), 'COMPUTADOR')) bind (1 as ?sc4) } . optional { filter (contains (ucase(?desc), 'VISION') && contains (ucase(?desc), 'COMPUTADOR')) bind (0.5 as ?sc5) } . optional { filter (contains (ucase(?subj), 'VISION') && contains (ucase(?subj), 'COMPUTADOR')) bind (0.75 as ?sc6) } . bind (coalesce(?sc1,0) + coalesce(?sc2,0) + coalesce(?sc3,0) + coalesce(?sc4,0) + coalesce(?sc5,0) + coalesce(?sc6,0) as ?score) . filter (?score > 0) } ORDER BY DESC (?score)

prefix text: <http://jena.apache.org/text#> prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> Select ?document ?sc1 ?sc2 ?sc3 ?sc4 ?sc5 ?sc6 ?score where { ?document dc:date ?y . FILTER(?y >= '2012') . FILTER (?y <= '2018') . ?document dc:title ?title . ?document dc:description ?desc . ?document dc:subject ?subj . optional { filter (contains (ucase(?title), 'PERRO')) bind (1 as ?sc1) } . optional { filter (contains (ucase(?desc), 'PERRO')) bind (0.5 as ?sc2) } . optional { filter (contains (ucase(?subj), 'PERRO')) bind (0.75 as ?sc3) } . optional { filter (contains (ucase(?title), 'GATO')) bind (1 as ?sc4) } . optional { filter (contains (ucase(?desc), 'GATO')) bind (0.5 as ?sc5) } . optional { filter (contains (ucase(?subj), 'GATO')) bind (0.75 as ?sc6) } . optional { filter (contains (ucase(?subj), 'VETERINARIA')) bind (2 as ?sc7) } . bind (coalesce(?sc1,0) + coalesce(?sc2,0) + coalesce(?sc3,0) + coalesce(?sc4,0) + coalesce(?sc5,0) + coalesce(?sc6,0) + coalesce(?sc7,0) as ?score) . filter (?score > 0) } ORDER BY DESC (?score)

prefix text: <http://jena.apache.org/text#> prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> Select ?document ?sc1 ?sc2 ?score where { ?document dc:type ?t . FILTER(?t = 'TAZ-TFG' || ?t = 'TAZ-TFM') . ?document dc:publisher ?publisher . FILTER (CONTAINS(ucase(?publisher), 'INFORMATICA')) . ?document dc:creator ?creator . ?document dc:contributor ?contributor . optional { filter (contains (?creator, 'Lopez')) bind (1 as ?sc1) } . optional { filter (contains (?contributor, 'Lopez')) bind (0.5 as ?sc2) } . bind (coalesce(?sc1,0) + coalesce(?sc2,0) as ?score) . filter (?score > 0) } ORDER BY DESC (?score)

prefix text: <http://jena.apache.org/text#> prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> Select ?document ?score where { ?document dc:title ?title . FILTER(!CONTAINS(?title, 'XX') && !CONTAINS(?title, 'XXI')) . ?document dc:subject ?subj . FILTER(!CONTAINS(?subj, 'XX') && !CONTAINS(?subj, 'XXI')) . ?document dc:description ?desc . FILTER(!CONTAINS(?desc, 'XX') && !CONTAINS(?desc, 'XXI')) . optional { filter (contains (ucase(?title), 'ARTE')) bind (0.6 as ?sc1) } . optional { filter (contains (ucase(?subj), 'ARTE')) bind (0.5 as ?sc2) } . optional { filter (contains (ucase(?description), 'ARTE')) bind (0.4 as ?sc3) } . bind (coalesce(?sc1,0) + coalesce(?sc2,0) + coalesce(?sc3,0) as ?scorearte) . filter (?scorearte > 0) . optional { filter (contains (ucase(?title), 'ARAGONES')) bind (0.6 as ?sc4) } . optional { filter (contains (ucase(?subj), 'ARAGONES')) bind (0.5 as ?sc5) } . optional { filter (contains (ucase(?description), 'ARAGONES')) bind (0.4 as ?sc6) } . bind (?scorearte + coalesce(?sc4,0) + coalesce(?sc5,0) + coalesce(?sc6,0) as ?score) . } ORDER BY DESC (?score)

prefix text: <http://jena.apache.org/text#> prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> Select ?document ?score where { ?document dc:title ?title . ?document dc:description ?desc . ?document dc:subject ?subj . ?document dc:subject ?subj2 . ?document dc:subject ?subj3 . optional { filter (contains (UCASE(?title), 'ALGORITMO') && contains (UCASE(?title), 'BUSQUEDA')) bind (0.5 as ?sc1) } . optional { filter (contains (UCASE(?desc), 'ALGORITMO') && contains (UCASE(?desc), 'BUSQUEDA')) bind (0.5 as ?sc2) } . optional { filter exists {(contains (UCASE(?subj), 'BUSQUEDA')) bind (0.25 as ?sc3) } . optional { filter (contains (UCASE(?subj2), 'ALGORITMO')) bind (0.25 as ?sc4) } . bind (coalesce(?sc1,0) + coalesce(?sc2,0) + coalesce(?sc3,0) + coalesce(?sc4,0) as ?scorealgbusq) . filter (?scorealgbusq >= 0.5) . optional { filter (contains (ucase(?subj3), 'MEDICINA')) bind (0.5 as ?sc5) } . optional { filter (contains (ucase(?title), 'MEDICINA') || contains (ucase(?desc), 'MEDICINA')) bind (1.5 as ?sc5) } . optional { filter (contains (ucase(?title), 'CADENA') && contains (ucase(?title), 'PROTEINAS')) bind (1 as ?sc6) } . optional { filter (contains (ucase(?desc), 'CADENA') && contains (ucase(?desc), 'PROTEINAS')) bind (1 as ?sc7) } . optional { filter (contains (ucase(?title), 'PACIENTE') && contains (ucase(?title), 'SINTOMA')) bind (1 as ?sc8) } . optional { filter (contains (ucase(?desc), 'PACIENTE') && contains (ucase(?desc), 'SINTOMA')) bind (1 as ?sc9) } . bind (coalesce(?sc5,0) + coalesce(?sc6,0) + coalesce(?sc7,0) + coalesce(?sc8,0) + coalesce(?sc9,0) as ?scoremedicina) . filter (?scoremedicina > 0) . bind (?scorealgbusq + ?scoremedicina as ?score) . } ORDER BY DESC (?score)
